26 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
27 #if defined(DepthSense_EXPORTS)
28 #
29 # if defined(_MSC_VER)
30 # define DEPTHSENSE_API __declspec(dllexport)
31 # elif defined(__GNUC__)
32 # define DEPTHSENSE_API __attribute__((visibility("default")))
33 # else
34 # error Unsupported compiler
35 # endif /* _MSC_VER || __GNUC__ */
36 #
37 #elif defined(DepthSense_STATIC)
38 #
39 # define DEPTHSENSE_API
40 #
41 #else /* !DepthSense_EXPORTS && !DepthSense_STATIC */
42 #
43 # if defined(_MSC_VER)
44 # define DEPTHSENSE_API __declspec(dllimport)
45 # elif defined(__GNUC__)
46 # define DEPTHSENSE_API __attribute__((visibility("default")))
47 # else
48 # error Unsupported compiler
49 # endif /* _MSC_VER || __GNUC__ */
50 #
51 #endif /* DepthSense_EXPORTS */

54 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
55 // Helper macros for private data access in API classes
56 
57 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_DECLARE(C) \
58 private: \
59  class C##Private; \
60  friend class C##Private; \
61  inline C##Private &get_priv() { return *priv; } \
62  inline const C##Private &get_priv() const { return *((const C##Private *) priv); } \
63  C##Private *priv
64 
65 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_BEGIN(C) \
66 class C::C##Private { \
67 private: \
68  friend class C
69 
70 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_BEGIN_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
71 class N::C::C##Private { \
72 private: \
73  friend class N::C
74 
75 // variant to avoid "first seen using 'struct' now seen using 'class'" warnings with MSVC
76 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_STRUCT_BEGIN_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
77 class N::C::C##Private { \
78 private: \
79  friend struct N::C
80 
81 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_END(C) \
82 }
83 
84 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_END_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
85 }
86 
87 // for completeness; see above
88 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_STRUCT_END_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
89 }
90 
91 #define DEPTHSENSE_STRUCT_BASE(C) \
92 C(); \
93 C(const C &); \
94 ~C(); \
95 C &operator=(const C &)
96 
97 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_ALLOCATE(C) \
98 priv = new C##Private()
99 
100 // to be used in copy constructors
101 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_COPY_ALLOCATE(C, arg) \
102 priv = new C##Private(arg.get_priv())
103 
104 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_DEALLOCATE(C) \
105 delete priv
106 
107 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_CTOR(C) \
108 C##Private()
109 
110 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_COPY_CTOR(C, arg) \
111 C##Private(const C##Private &arg)
112 
113 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_OPERATOR_EQUAL(C, arg) \
114 C##Private &operator=(const C##Private &arg)
115 
116 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_OPERATOR_EQUALITY(C, arg) \
117 bool operator==(const C##Private &arg) const
118 
119 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_DTOR(C) \
120 virtual ~C##Private()
121 
122 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_INIT(C) \
123 C##Private &m = get_priv(); (void)m
124 
125 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_INIT_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
126 N::C::C##Private &m = get_priv()
127 
128 #define DEPTHSENSE_PRIVATE_NAMESPACE(C) \
129 C::C##Private::
130 
131 
132 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
133 // Helper macros for protected data access in API classes
134 
135 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_DECLARE(C) \
136 protected: \
137  class C##Protected; \
138  friend class C##Protected; \
139  inline C##Protected &get_prot() { return *prot; } \
140  inline const C##Protected &get_prot() const { return *((const C##Protected *) prot); } \
141  C##Protected *prot
142 
143 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_BEGIN(C) \
144 class C::C##Protected { \
145 protected: \
146  friend class C
147 
148 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_BEGIN_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
149 class N::C::C##Protected { \
150 protected: \
151  friend class N::C
152 
153 // variant to avoid "first seen using 'struct' now seen using 'class'" warnings with MSVC
154 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_STRUCT_BEGIN_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
155 class N::C::C##Protected { \
156 protected: \
157  friend struct N::C
158 
159 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_END(C) \
160 }
161 
162 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_END_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
163 }
164 
165 // for completeness; see above
166 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_STRUCT_END_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
167 }
168 
169 #define DEPTHSENSE_STRUCT_BASE(C) \
170 C(); \
171 C(const C &); \
172 ~C(); \
173 C &operator=(const C &)
174 
175 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_ALLOCATE(C) \
176 prot = new C##Protected()
177 
178 // to be used in copy constructors
179 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_COPY_ALLOCATE(C, arg) \
180 prot = new C##Protected(arg.get_prot())
181 
182 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_DEALLOCATE(C) \
183 delete prot
184 
185 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_CTOR(C) \
186 C##Protected()
187 
188 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_COPY_CTOR(C, arg) \
189 C##Protected(const C##Protected &arg)
190 
191 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_OPERATOR_EQUAL(C, arg) \
192 C##Protected &operator=(const C##Protected &arg)
193 
194 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_DTOR(C) \
195 virtual ~C##Protected()
196 
197 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_INIT(C) \
198 C##Protected &m = get_prot()
199 
200 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_INIT_USING_NAMESPACE(N, C) \
201 N::C::C##Protected &m = get_prot()
202 
203 #define DEPTHSENSE_PROTECTED_NAMESPACE(C) \
204 C::C##Protected::
205

207 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
208 // Helper macro for disabling copy constructors and overloaded = operators;
209 // to be used in the private: section of the class definition
210 
211 #define DEPTHSENSE_DISABLE_COPY(C) \
212 C(const C &src); \
213 C &operator=(const C &src)
214 
215 #endif /* _DEPTHSENSEAPI_H */
